lender.name: Sunil
lender.loan_because: It's wonderful that even small contributions can help to grow businesses.
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses reduce the environmental impact of their operations.

lender.name: Mariella
lender.loan_because: I come myself from a developing country and I have seen the need

lender.name: Douglas
lender.loan_because: I want to help people in Latin America.
lender.occupational_info: I train people to work on ambulances.

lender.name: kyle
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel good to connect with others and help them reach their goals
lender.occupational_info: I work as a healing professional. My work involves helping others to regain their mobility.

lender.name: Sebastian
lender.loan_because: I want to help people to live independent without the need of donations

lender.name: Linden
lender.loan_because: Because it is something I can do to help people have a viable economic life where they live. That way they don't have to leave their families to work somewhere else.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a city doing environmental procurement and environmental legislation.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: We will get nowhere unless we help each other.
lender.occupational_info: I design new products using computers.

lender.name: Paulianne
lender.loan_because: I'm impressed by the results of Grameen Bank and microcredit lending in general. I appreciate the opportunity to be involved at an affordable level.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired from the computer industry and occasionally substitute at a small rural library.

lender.name: Kristy
lender.loan_because: I was given the opportunity as a holiday present. What a great gift!

lender.name: Moon Circle
lender.loan_because: it feels good to help those who really need it
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of women who meet every month at the full moon and have fun.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I love as God loves us

lender.name: Sagely Sarah
lender.occupational_info: I work with college students around the world, giving them the opportunity to have a personal relationship with Jesus Christ.

lender.name: Upbeat & Funny
lender.loan_because: I want you to feel upbeat today
lender.occupational_info: Managing someone else's money

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: respect 3rd world hustle

lender.name: Anna & Gunnar
lender.loan_because: Couldn't find a reason not to...
lender.occupational_info: Anna works in the pulp and paper industry and Gunnar in IT consulting.

lender.name: Erika
lender.loan_because: I want to help.

lender.name: Vigdis
lender.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves.

lender.name: pax
lender.loan_because: A joy shared is a joy doubled. -- Swedish proverb
lender.occupational_info: Entrepreneur. Innovator. Explorer.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: I believe that Free Enterprise is a very big part of full and vibrant nations, economies, communities and most importantly families.

lender.name: Laurel
lender.loan_because: I first was loved.

lender.name: Thibault
lender.occupational_info: I work in a research institute to understand the fate of pollutants in soil, and particularly their transfer to plants. The applied aim is the reduction of crop contamination and soil clean-up.

lender.name: Margaret
lender.loan_because: We are all family on this planet. When anyone in my family needs my help and I can give it, I will.
lender.occupational_info: I am an artist. I work with beautiful fabric. Ethnic fabric is my special interest.

lender.name: Carl
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Mark
lender.occupational_info: I work for an international Christian Child Development Organization

lender.name: Teddy
lender.loan_because: This is a fantastic way to help your fellow man!

lender.name: Nzinga Mbunde
lender.loan_because: I would like to help support global entrepreneurship the same way that my family and loved ones have supported my small business through micro-loans. I believe if someone has a great idea for a business, they should be allowed to opportunity to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: My work involves exploring and creating new ways to implement educational technology (e.g. robots, low-cost computers, solar phones, etc.) into global classrooms at low costs. Technology is the new revolution which will help level the global playing field for many countries who did not have the opportunity to partake in the Industrial Revolution.

lender.name: Anders Lundberg
lender.loan_because: I'd like to help people to become entrepreneurial and control their own destiny
lender.occupational_info: Telecom entreprenuer

lender.name: Torbjörn
lender.loan_because: I think it's a really efficient way.

lender.name: Yvonne, Ken & Sophie
lender.loan_because: "I expect to pass through this world but once; any good thing therefore that I can do, or any kindness that I can show to any fellow creature, let me do it now; let me not defer or neglect it, for I shall not pass this way again." Ettiene De Grellet.
lender.occupational_info: Yvonne is mother to Sophie and wife to Ken. She is originally from Northern Ireland and has been an educator in Arizona for over 25 years.

lender.name: Mattias Forss
lender.loan_because: This is an easy way to make difference in our world.
lender.occupational_info: I started my own company for more than 13 years ago, when I was just 13 years old. My company work with computers and Internet services, and currently I have 8 employees.

lender.name: Björn
lender.loan_because: 25 bucks is a piss i mississippi
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers

lender.name: Maria
lender.loan_because: It seems like a grate opportunity to make a differens for someone.

lender.name: Ron
lender.occupational_info: I help make a U.S. college better and more affordable for students who attend it. I do this by asking people to consider providing gifts that support the college in important ways. Happily, we have many donors who respond positively.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I believe this world will be a better place for all of us when people are out of poverty and able to be self sufficient.
lender.occupational_info: I help people get loans and insurance to buy homes.

lender.name: Jack
lender.loan_because: Give something away to a person, and he will be happy for a day. Teach him how to create, and he will be happy his whole life :)
lender.occupational_info: Automobile Electronics Technician

lender.name: Niklas
lender.loan_because: I think this is a way to make a good donation without making the receivers dependant on me
lender.occupational_info: Work with computers

lender.name: Pat
lender.loan_because: It is good.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a doctor

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I want motivated people to be able to create their own destiny.
lender.occupational_info: I teach young people how to be engineers so that they will have skills to help others.

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: It's individual action, from the bottom up, that will lead to better lives and a better enviroment, locally and globally.

lender.name: Kristen
lender.loan_because: I like to give my money (energy) away and hope others can benefit from my good energy. We are all connected so why not stay connected.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an Ace Hardware store. I sell hardware to people who need to fix their houses up. I sell paint, garden equipment and other items to repair your home.

lender.name: Patrik
lender.loan_because: I like to help people. I think micro loans is a good way to empower people.
lender.occupational_info: I write computer systems for the government

lender.name: Shanda
lender.loan_because: This is a gift that keeps on giving.

lender.name: Carla
lender.loan_because: I know what it's like to have a dream.

lender.name: Kimberly & Shaun
lender.loan_because: Micro-lending is a fantastic way to give less fortunate people a leg up.
lender.occupational_info: Residential construction

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I want to help people and enjoy giving back.

lender.name: Alison
lender.loan_because: I can see where and to whom my contribution is going. It makes it much more personal.
lender.occupational_info: I work at the front office in a Catholic church, answering phones and greeting people.

lender.name: Sue
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference by helping people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am the Chief Financial Officer for a small business that services and repairs medical equipment.

lender.name: Audri, Estrella & Carla
lender.loan_because: I believe we should all pay it forward.
lender.occupational_info: I help people who have been injured in accidents.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I believe in leveling the playing field and giving people a helping hand not just a handout.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a humanitarian photojournalist.

lender.name: Marion
lender.loan_because: There were times when a few dollars made a big difference to my future.
lender.occupational_info: I help the government get aid to students.

lender.name: Tove
lender.loan_because: I belive in a better world :)

lender.name: Simon
lender.loan_because: To connect with other people in other places. Kiva is the next best thing to travel, I get to be a part of something great, half way around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work with people to protect the marine environment where I live, in Washington state. We work with citizens to help them protect the places and marine species that they care most about. The organization I work for is called the Northwest Straits Commission.

lender.name: Faith
lender.loan_because: I feel it is important for people to help each other out. There have been people in my life who have helped me when I've really needed it, and I hope to do the same for others.
lender.occupational_info: As an archaeologist and a graphic designer I learn about the technologies, cultural traditions and occupation patterns of people over time and then translate what I've learned into exhibits, illustrations and video to educate others.

lender.name: Sandy
lender.loan_because: It is a direct way to help others and I value the work effort.
lender.occupational_info: Selling land and homes. Helping people improve their lives.

lender.name: Jenifer
lender.loan_because: Blessings are to be shared and I am blessed.

lender.name: Fabian
lender.loan_because: I feel that everyone needs a helping hand every once and awhile.
lender.occupational_info: I am full time student, working toward a bachelor's degree in civil engineering and I also work in the family business as a power sweeper. I drive a sweeper truck around and clean parking lot of malls, office buildings, and parking garages.

lender.name: Tommy Winkletoes
lender.loan_because: I read about KIVA in my newspaper and thought that it seemed like a very good idea. I like being able to choose the kind of businesses and entrepreneurs I support.
lender.occupational_info: As a civil engineer I lived and worked on road projects in Sweden, Ghana, Tanzania, Yemen and Laos.

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: it is a mitzvah to help others help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: educator, musician, clergy.

lender.name: Fredrik
lender.loan_because: I felt it was a good way to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a Stockholm based communications company, Soya, with a profile on communicating sustainable development.

lender.name: CommonGround Trade
lender.loan_because: As Methodist Christians we are called to practice the 3 simple rules: do no harm, do good, and stay in love with God.
lender.occupational_info: As a small, rural congregation we strive to "Grow Gods' Kingdom by Making Disciples of Jesus Christ for the Transformation of the World."

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: We live in one world and we have a duty to help one another.
lender.occupational_info: I taught History and Economics for many years at Dawson College in Montreal. I recently retired.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I want to give someone who has an inspiration or business a chance. It's an awesome idea.
lender.occupational_info: I fly airplanes around the world.

lender.name: Carrie
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance to try to make a better life for themselves.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I support entrepreneurs everywhere.
lender.occupational_info: I help business owners get more business by getting them before lots of prospects at once.

lender.name: TARP Capital
lender.occupation: an alternative investment and asset management com

lender.name: Marco
lender.loan_because: I am NOT a stingy bastard.

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: One way I can help other people
lender.occupational_info: Look after Computer systems for a Electricity company

lender.name: Steve
lender.occupational_info: I teach English to young kids.

lender.name: Jerry
lender.loan_because: I teach development and have a segment on micro fiance. I want to learn how this works. It would be useful if Kiva would publish the interest rates that are charged to the people I loan to.
lender.occupational_info: We work on natural disasters and developing financial solutions for the poor against weather related risks. Most of this work is related to agriculture.

lender.name: Victoria
lender.loan_because: I was given a gift certificate by my mother, and checked the site out. I wish I had found this site sooner! I plan on investing even more money monthly to help out people around the world!
lender.occupational_info: I am currently going to school so that I may become a medical doctor. Once I am a medical doctor, I plan to work in rural areas where there are no other doctors to help the people living there.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: I want to make the world a better place to live.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student in high school...I think that's pretty self-explanatory

lender.name: Gerri
lender.loan_because: My mom had a lot of faith in me when I started out as a musician many years ago. Were it not for her own "micro loans" I never would have gotten off the ground. So now I want to "pay that forward" in honor of her memory.
lender.occupational_info: I am a singer and musician who collects and performs American folk songs by and about women. I use these songs to teach people about American women's history.

lender.name: Louis
lender.loan_because: I believe we will all be happier if we share.
lender.occupational_info: I make music for movies and television shows

lender.name: Noah
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help people who are less fortunate than me.

lender.name: mr j
lender.loan_because: i can. i should. i hope it will help someone who has the vision and the desire but lacks the resources.
lender.occupational_info: physically and mentally challenging.

lender.name: Greg, Mara, and Noah
lender.loan_because: I believe in microfinance as one way to lift people out of poverty
lender.occupational_info: I study how health care systems work in different countries and I take care of my patients

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I want to help others achieve a better life for them and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I teach people how to manage projects efficiently and effectively.

lender.name: ElLoise
lender.loan_because: it's a very cool thing to do

lender.name: Lili and Tessa
lender.loan_because: it's a way that we can change a lot with a little. We are going to try to get Tessa's school involved too.

lender.name: Barbara

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I believe in a persons desire to make a better life and want to help
lender.occupational_info: I manage office and manufacturing buiildings

lender.loan_because: We are so fortunate and wish to share

lender.occupational_info: I provide internal support to computer users internal to my place of employment, as well as work on internal computer-related projects and tasks.

lender.name: Eva B
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I appreciate determination and resourcefulness
lender.occupational_info: doctor

lender.name: Mary Beth
lender.loan_because: I learned about Kiva on Frontline and knew immediately that this program was offering something more profound than charity. And I like the idea of people coming together to make a large difference in others' lives.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English literature to high school students--and also help them in the college-application process. I suspect there are a lot of teachers who loan through Kiva.

lender.name: Georgia
lender.loan_because: I enjoy the act of giving to a good cause and have seen on my travels the hardships of others and would like to help others to prosper.
lender.occupational_info: I help build the electricity infrastructure. My company builds the poles and wires to bring electricity to homes and businesses.

lender.name: Nick
lender.loan_because: Jesus died for me

lender.name: Irene
lender.loan_because: I want to be able to help those who do not have the means and resources to do so. This way each person raising their funds can have a better tomorrow.
lender.occupational_info: I ensure appropriate use of the medicines made by my company.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: It's so important to help people who are willing and able to work but just need that extra assistance to move ahead in life.
lender.occupational_info: I help young people incorporate healthy, nutritious food into their daily diet and also work at increasing physical fitness into their lives.

lender.name: Marc and Nancy
lender.occupation: Marc: Attorney, state legislator & Nancy: Teacher
lender.loan_because: To help others in their pursuit of the dream

lender.name: Gail
lender.loan_because: These are industrious people who just need a little help in providing a future for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I work in Human Resources. Hopefully, I am supporting people in achieving their potential. Now I can do it thru Kiva too!

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I believe in small business, I believe in the power of a woman who has the ability to generate her own income and take care of her own family, and I love being able to give a little help here and there.
lender.occupational_info: I support small business and artisans by promoting their work and the industry that supports them.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I am teaching my children about investing their money in socially responsible ways.

lender.name: Margaret
lender.loan_because: Sometimes just a little help can make a huge difference to a persons life. How wonderful is the concept of Kiva. Allowing us to lend to someone then to relend when the money is paid back.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: I have seen firsthand how people can benefit from microloans.
lender.occupational_info: I teach 12 and 13 year olds about the history of the United States.

lender.name: Zainab
lender.loan_because: they are my sisters and my brothers.
lender.occupational_info: I study enzyme reactions, how they work and why they work the way they do.

lender.name: Alexander
lender.occupational_info: I run a company that markets school graduation hats and school photography. I work with IT and business development questions.

lender.name: Warrick
lender.loan_because: I can, and realizing you can make even a small difference - feels wonderful.

lender.name: Esteban
lender.loan_because: I love Jesus and Jesus loves everybody.... So I love everybody, and you help the one´s you love..
lender.occupational_info: I teach small people the value of life in a Sewdish school

lender.name: Jill
lender.loan_because: i have been very blessed to do what I love and want to be able to help others around the world.
lender.occupational_info: natural and candid portraiture for kids, families and commercial clients.

lender.name: DAVID
lender.occupational_info: I work for the County of Los Angeles, Department of Social Services. Our Department provides benefits and services to low-income residents of Los Angeles County.

lender.name: Robert & Sara
lender.loan_because:
A man has made at least a start on discovering the meaning of human life when he plants shade trees under which he knows full well he will never sit.
D. Elton Trueblood
lender.occupational_info:
Two things are important to me now:
To create meaningful change in our world. To mentor those who come behind us, so they will not struggle as much as we did.

lender.name: Pål
lender.loan_because: Because micro credit seems to work :-)
lender.occupational_info: I'm a software developer writing Java code for the norwegian service SendRegning.no

lender.name: Darin
lender.loan_because: From a global perspective I know I am lucky
lender.occupational_info: I help people in need of emergency medical care

lender.name: Lena

lender.loan_because: I'm able to

lender.name: Bo Andre
lender.loan_because: I believe this is a good way to help others create a better living.

lender.name: Hakan Tillman
lender.loan_because: I like to make a difference for people less fortunate than me. I like to do that the "help to self help" way as we say in Sweden, meaning loaning money to help individuals improve their situation rather than just dump money in some anonymous help program where the most of it is eaten up by overhead costs.
lender.occupational_info: I'm the CEO and owner of a company that wholesale industrial paint in Sweden.

lender.name: Veikko
lender.loan_because: KIVA gives me a opportunity to contribute
